segments.text: Do you have your own circle of friends ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I have friends even though I am a man of few words . Just like the old saying goes , " Actions speak louder than words " . I am a hard-working silent person .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What you said was right , but we need to work as a team , how could you make adjustment to that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Teamwork is ok to me , and I hope the team will be complementary in personality .
segments.speaker: S2
